sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import './about.css' class About extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state={ critic:false, pCo:false, firstName:"" } } basic() { this.setState({ critic:false, pCo:false }) } pCo() { this.setState({ critic:false, pCo:true }) } critic() { this.setState({ critic:true, pCo:false }) alert(this.state.firstName) } nameChange = e => { this.setState({firstName:e.target.value}) } render() { return (
{ this.state.pCo? :null } { this.state.critic || this.state.pCo? :null }
) } } export default About
